resources.string: Apakah Anda memiliki Twitch atau Kanal YouTube?
Sertakan kata kunci \"lishogi.org\" dalam judul stream Anda saat Anda streaming di Lishogi.
Hapus kata kunci saat Anda streaming hal-hal yang bukan Lishogi.
Lishogi akan mendeteksi stream Anda secara otomatis dan mengaktifkan fasilitas berikut:
Dapatkan ikon api streamer di profil Lishogi Anda.
Masuk ke dalam list top streamer.
Tunjukkan streaming Anda di game, turnamen, dan studi Anda.
You have been selected for frontpage featuring!
Note that we can only show a limited number of streams on the homepage,
so yours may not always appear.
Stream Anda telah ditinjau oleh moderator.
Silakan isi informasi streamer Anda, dan unggah gambar.
Kapan Anda siap terdaftar sebagai streamer Lishogi, %s

If your stream is in a language other than English, include the correct language tag (%s), enclosed in square brackets, at the start of your stream title. As examples, you can include \"[RU]\" for Russian, \"[TR]\" for Turkish, \"[FR]\" for French, etc. Put this in the stream title in the Twitch or YouTube page, not in the Lishogi stream settings. If your stream is in English, there is no need to include a language tag.
Streamer pages eventually expire if they are not used for a long time, also, you must stream once within a week of your approval or the page de-activates. The streaming trophy will also not appear on your account until youâ€™ve streamed. If your streamer page has expired you must apply again and wait to be approved.
Nama pengguna Twitch Anda atau URL
Opsional. Biarkan kosong jika tidak ada
Channel YouTube ID Anda atau URL
Dalam satu kalimat, beri tahu kami tentang stream Anda
Be safe from ads and trackers infesting Twitch and YouTube. Lishogi recommends uBlock Origin which is free and open-source.
